Message to Valve
The lack of communication between Valve and the Half-Life community has been a frustrating experience. While continued support for current and future products is greatly appreciated, fans of the Half-Life series have waited years for a word on when the franchise will return.

So, Instead of focusing efforts in a negative and disrespectful way, we have decided to gain Valve's attention by delivering a basic message:
  
Your oldest and longest running fanbase would like better communication.

Waiting patiently for over four years can be challenging as a fan, especially when E3 comes and goes without any sign of the Half-Life series and its continuation. Valve had stated that information was scheduled to be released towards the end of 2008, and we believe that if they have chosen to change those plans, fans should be acknowledged, regardless of developmental plans for the next Half-Life project. 

The entire trilogy of episodes was scheduled to be completed and released by 2007, and if Valve have decided to do other things for the time being, that is fine; all that we ask for is a basic response on the matter, and to let fans know whether or not the current story arc is scheduled to conclude at another point in time.
  
In addition: This message is in no way, shape or form attempting to rush the development of the Half-Life series; in fact, most members agree that Valve should take the time needed to deliver a complete and polished product.

If you agree with the above message and statements, please join this group and share your support constructively.

Hopefully such attention will be recognized by Valve, and the community's voice will be heard.
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve
Have fun.

When is ready Episode 3? I wait it!

So well, bought this game and palyed until a part where it is supposed to that I need to take a chopper to search for Borealis. A little tired of the past 3 hours playing, I saved the game right before that.

Coming back to load the saved game, in a mood to "Oh yes let's continue Freeman's adventure", just to find out the credit screen rolls not long after that.

RIGHT at that particular moment, I wandered withn the void, the cold absyss, soul-less, meaningless. I asked, and I wished upon the star,


"Where is Half-Life 3?"

Класная игра

Episode Two jest to Bezpośrednia kontynuacja HL2 Episode One. Część ta jest znacznie dłuższa niż poprzednia. Przestrzeń w której znajduje się gracz jest znacznie większa. Realia walki rebeliantów z bogato uzbrojonym wrogiem są zdecydowanie dużo bardziej krwawe. Już w początkowym etapie rozgrywki Alyx zostaje poważnie ranna w starciu z " Mini Striderem ". Tradycyjnie już mamy styczność z momentami gdzie musimy wykazać się logiką, oraz mamy możliwość strzelania na full auto podczas gdy wraz z Alyx bronimy się przed kombinatem w budynku pośrodku lasu. Dużą frajdę daje jazda lub jak kto woli drive by "Mustangiem" w trybie turbo na szutrowych drogach. Graficznie wszystko wygląda bardzo ładnie. Zakończenie wprowadza nas poniekąd do fabuły "Episode Three" lub HL3 jednak w odczuciu gracza który przez wszystkie części zżył się z głównymi bohaterami stojącymi na czele rebelii jest zaskakujące i smutne, a jednocześnie wzbudza chęć zemsty na "kombinacie".

Half-Life 2: Episode 2 continues from the ending of Half-Life 2: Episode 1.

Pros:
Great story.
Great chracters.
Amazing gameplay.
Amazing graphics.
Yet again Alyx is your compainion throughout this episode. (And a Vortigaunt for a while.)
New enemies. (Antlion Workers and Combine Hunters.)
Massive battle just before the end.
A part where you have to survive several waves of Antlions using turrets and mines.

Cons:
None!

This is perfect if you have completed Half-Life 2 and the previous episode.

Half-Life® 2: Episode Two — вторая часть из трилогии новинок от Valve, которая продолжает события знаменитой серии Half-Life®.

Вас в шкуре кандидата наук Гордона Фримена в последний раз видели покидающим Сити-17 вместе с Аликс Вэнс в тот самый момент, когда Цитадель взлетела на воздух от взрыва неведомой силы. Во втором эпизоде вам предстоит пробиться сквозь силы Альянса до Белой Рощи, чтобы доставить пакет с критически важной информацией, украденный в Цитадели, на базу Сопротивления — в руки ученых.

Второй эпизод продолжает классический игровой процесс Half-Life, добавив в него уникальные виды оружия, средства передвижения и новые разновидности монстров.
